Corporate purpose

The operation and maintenance of hospitals, in particular the operation of the HELIOS St. Marienberg Klinik Helmstedt, in accordance with the respective findings in the hospital plan of the state of Lower Saxony, including the operation of nursing and other ancillary facilities, the operation of other social institutions as well as training and further education facilities (e.g. Academic Teaching Hospital of the Otto von Guericke University Magdeburg and Nursing School). Furthermore, the takeover or establishment as well as the operation of medical care centers in accordance with Section 95 SGB V. The purpose of the operation of the Medical Care Centers is the outpatient treatment within the framework of contractual and private medical care as well as all other activities that medical care centers are legally made possible.
